Package model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class that handles the game. Handles the board, the main loop, the end conditions

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Square[] grid  
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Pawn> pawnList  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Game()
      class constructor in case the game is loaded
      Game​(java.lang.String player1, java.lang.String player2, Mode gameMode)
      class constructor in case both player are human
      Game​(java.lang.String player1, java.lang.String player2, Mode gameMode, Difficulty dif)
      class constructor in case the user is playing against the machine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void changePlayer()
      changes the current player to the other player
      int detectLonguestChain()
      Detects the longuest chain of a player.
      void drawBoard()
      Method used to draw th board with the pawns in the current stat in the console
      void end()
      method used to end the game when someone won
      int getNbPawn()
      Gets the number of pawn remanining possessed py the player (counting the ZEN pawn) Used to compare to the longuest chain
      boolean isMovePossible​(Pawn p, int[] coordinates)
      Checks if the enterd move is possible : 1) Evaluates the Direction by using relatives positions of the pawn and the entended move 2) Checks if there are some enemy pawn on the way
      boolean isWon()
      isWon is called to verify if the game was won by one of the players
      void makeMove()
      updates pawns positions after readMove
      void readMove()
      readMove reads the players next move (asks for pawn to move, and for the next coordinates).
      void removePawn​(Pawn p)
      Removes a Pawn from pawnList, if this one is taken by the oppponent, and is therefor no longer in game
      void setBoard()
      setBoard is called once by the constructor, to initialize the board and the pawns
      void start()
      method used to start the game

      • Game

        public Game​(java.lang.String player1,
            java.lang.String player2,
            Mode gameMode)
        class constructor in case both player are human
        Parameters:
        player1 - name of the first player
        player2 - name of the second player
        gameMode - gameMode (for debugging purposes)

            java.lang.String player2,
            Mode gameMode,
            Difficulty dif)
        class constructor in case the user is playing against the machine
        Parameters:
        player1 - name of the first player
        player2 - name of the second player
        gameMode - gameMode (for debugging purposes)
        dif - Difficulty of the Automated player

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        method used to start the game

      • end

        public void end()
        method used to end the game when someone won

      • drawBoard

        public void drawBoard()
        Method used to draw th board with the pawns in the current stat in the console

      • readMove

        public void readMove()
        readMove reads the players next move (asks for pawn to move, and for the next coordinates). Reapats until move is right, or the player saved the game to quit.

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove()
        updates pawns positions after readMove

      • removePawn

        public void removePawn​(Pawn p)
        Removes a Pawn from pawnList, if this one is taken by the oppponent, and is therefor no longer in game
        Parameters:
        p - Pawn to remove

      • detectLonguestChain

        public int detectLonguestChain()
        Detects the longuest chain of a player. Is used to detect if there is a winner.
        Returns:
        the longuest chain length

      • getNbPawn

        public int getNbPawn()
        Gets the number of pawn remanining possessed py the player (counting the ZEN pawn) Used to compare to the longuest chain

      • isWon

        public boolean isWon()
        isWon is called to verify if the game was won by one of the players
        Returns:
        true if there is a winner or a tie, else otherwise

      • setBoard

        public void setBoard()
        setBoard is called once by the constructor, to initialize the board and the pawns

      • changePlayer

        public void changePlayer()
        changes the current player to the other player

      • isMovePossible

        public boolean isMovePossible​(Pawn p,
                              int[] coordinates)
        Checks if the enterd move is possible : 1) Evaluates the Direction by using relatives positions of the pawn and the entended move 2) Checks if there are some enemy pawn on the way
        Parameters:
        p - Pawn to move
        coordinates - position of the final square the player is trying to move is pawn on
        Returns:
        true if the move is possible, false otherwise
